column4: is xubuntu easy to install? how long is the installation? can i watch movies and access torrents ?

it has a firewall (iptables) but does not have an anticirus nor does it need one
clamav exists, but it does not need one

you could use wubi

yes

ye

you probably just need to add a new screen section to xorg.conf
